global_caption: a scene featuring a middle-aged woman holding a basket walking with her husband, who has a happy smile and is wearing a flower-patterned one-piece, a man putting his hand on his wife while lifting a tray with a lot of water bottles on it, where she is wearing a blue T-shirt and beige-colored short pants, an old man wearing a gray cardigan and black beret taking a lovely look at a girl at the opposite side while walking beside the couple independently, a girl with a pink sleeveless shirt holding a yellow balloon in her left hand and a teddy bear in her right hand while walking toward the front side, and some cars parked in the park in the background.
